FuncDef: The display traffic-policy applied-record command displays traffic policy application records. The display traffic-policy applied-record command displays traffic policy application records.
CLIs: display traffic-policy applied-record [ <policy-name> ] [ global [ slot <slot-id> ] | interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } | vlan <vlan-id> | qosgroup <group-name> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> | bridge-domain <bd-id> ] [ inbound | outbound ]

display traffic-policy applied-record [ <policy-name> ] [ global [ slot <slot-id> ] | interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } | vlan <vlan-id> | qosgroup <group-name> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] [ inbound | outbound ]

display traffic-policy applied-record [ <policy-name> ] [ global [ slot <slot-id> ] | interface { <interface-type> <interface-number> | <interface-name> } | vlan <vlan-id> | qosgroup <group-name> | vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] [ inbound ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a traffic policy name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31  case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Displays the record of a traffic policy that has been applied globally.
-

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Displays the record of a traffic policy that has been applied to an interface.
interface-type specifies the interface type.interface-number specifies the interface number.
-
-

Displays the application record of a traffic policy on a specified interface.
-

Displays the record of a traffic policy that has been applied in a VLAN.
For the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ:The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
For the CE6885-LL (low latency mode):The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 1023.

Displays the record of a traffic policy that has been applied in a VPN.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces. The VPN instance name cannot be _public_. The character string can contain spaces if it is enclosed with double quotation marks ("").

Displays the record of a traffic policy that has been applied in the inbound direction.
-

Displays the record of a traffic policy that has been applied in the outbound direction.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
-

Displays the record of a traffic policy that has been applied in a QoS group.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Displays the record of a traffic policy that has been applied in a BD.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.
